title: Water Resources Systems
description: Components and services of water resources systems; and planning and management approaches in the face of climatic, environmental, and socio-economic change.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
